snippet: The Detroit Regional News Hub, an unusual collaboration of civic leaders and journalists, aims for a more balanced view of the city’s economic challenges.
abstract: Detroit Regional News Hub, collaboration of civic leaders and journalists formed in 2008, works with publications to present a more balanced view of the city and its economic challenges.
lead_paragraph: The Detroit Regional News Hub, an unusual collaboration of civic leaders and journalists, aims for a more balanced view of the city’s economic challenges.

headline.seo: Detroit Group Helps Journalists Cover the City’s Ups and Downs
headline.main: In Beleaguered Detroit, a Media-Wise Group Shows Reporters the Brighter Side
